remarks: Each object in a category has an associated identity arrow. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catidcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
catidcl.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
catidcl.i $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
catidcl.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
catidcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
catidcl $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) e. ( X H X ) ) $.
